author: palladia
body: Includes all changes from #922. Also fixed several issues suggested by Andy in #924. Fixed ClearScreen crash. Removed some functions related to scrolling that CoreCLR does not support. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/934)

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I'll pull as many of your changes into the public repo as I can to make tracking diffs easier.
I have also been make a few changes to the public repo, so I'll pull those into the private copy as well.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Anyway, I think I have merged your changes, and fixed your concerns.  Please review and merge.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This also fixed the scrolling exception I had on Windows. LGTM.

title: A number of PSReadLine changes
